alert.note: Alert for Coastal Taylor; Inland Taylor; Lafayette; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 4:46PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lafayette, eastern Taylor and Madison Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 446 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Jennings to 11 miles northwest of Bell. Movement was west at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mayo, Madison, Steinhatchee, Perry, Lee, Hamburg, Buckville, Pinetta, Lovett, Hatch Bend, Foley, Salem, Hanson, San Pedro Junction, Cooks Hammock, Chancey, Smith, Hopewell, Cherry Lake and Carbur. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Taylor; Inland Taylor; Lafayette; Madison
